content: lion brand pattern # 50970 published in knit it knit 1 learn to crochet digest learn to knit digest simply creative crochet woman s day skill level easy romance® old article #440 *discontinued* 480 yards crochet hook - size i-9 gauge 3 single_crochet and 2 chain-5 sps = 2½ \ 6 5 cm row 1 and 2 = 1½ \ 4 cm work in 2-row pattern repeat to desired length finish with 4-row ruffle for each end see ruffled stole #50979 1 for the knit version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/ruffled-stole-50979
